name: BooBot
0:
”Alexa, ask Boo Bot for a random short scary story from reddit”
”Alexa, ask Boo Bot for a scary story”
”Alexa, open Boo Bot”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boo bot
des: The skill returns a random short scary story from the subreddit r/shortscarystories on Reddit. This skill is as simple as it sounds, request a scary story. and Boo Bot shall deliver.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
